briefTitle: Acute Pain Trajectories and Persistent Pain After Breast Cancer Surgery
officialTitle: Acute Pain Trajectories as a Predictive Factor for Persistent Pain After Breast Cancer Surgery
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Presence of pain 3 months after surgery, assessed with the Brief Pain Inventory questionnaire. Yes/No
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Scheduled for breast cancer surgery
* General anesthesia

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous breast surgery
* Reconstructive surgery scheduled during follow-up
* Day-surgery patients
* Inability to understand the questionnaires
